data.name: Zombie Raid
data.detailed_description:
Zombie Raid is a PvP top-down shooter, with realistic looking tactical battles. Raid infected city, fight for survival in team battles.

GAME MODES

  • RAID

    Alone or in cooperative with other players, raid infected city, kill zombies and collect loot. But beware the other raiders in the way.

  • SQUAD COMBAT

    Team vs team battles. Teams of 4 players fight for control points.

  • DEATHMATCH

    PvP slaughter!! Free-for-all mode. The goal is to kill as many other players as possible until timelimit.

  • DUEL

    Solo PvP mode. Try yourself in one-on-one battles. You could call a duel in other game modes.

  • HORDE

    Fight with horde in cooperative with other players. Until you died..

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista or 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 640GTX or faster
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 750GTX or faster
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
